original_title: 貞操帯の女32 吉岡ひより
overview: Sakura's first boyfriend is her classmate Hiroshi. Hiroshi, who is in the prime of wanting to do it, approaches Sakura, but her first experience is something special for girls. Sakura, who wants to take care of her, continues to refuse Hiroshi's invitation without taking a step forward. One day, Sakura was stopped by a dubious man on her way home from school. Frightened by the man approaching her, Sakura tries to escape but is caught... Sakura, who was deprived of her virginity that she kept protecting in the empty house she was brought into...
title: Woman In Chastity Belt 32 Hiyori Yoshioka
